column4: it seems that whenever i tun wine in natty it just comp;etely crashes my window manager and logs me out. when loggin back in all my applications are closed. is anyone familiar with this issue?
ah i tried #wine and nobody was there. good to know. i have wine 1.3.15
the driver is made by nvidia and is the same version and files as the ones in the previous versions as there is only one source of the driver, nvidia
yea but all the ones ive tried just dont work. whenever i boot up gmd immediately crashes, if it even gets to the desktop before crashing
maybe its a bug with the xorg version in natty combined with the driver
could try the 185 driver instead, may be nicer
oops. i did try the non recommended as well as the free vesion. all did the same thing
so try the 185 driver, remove that driver and install the nvidia-glx-185 package
or if that is bad, try: nvidia-173
alright ill try 185. 173 is the other option in the drivers list, which does the same thing
you may need to run:  sudo nvidia-xconfig    it may help the driver to have an xorg.conf file
yea i did notice that when installing the driver and running sudo nvidia-settings it never made an xconf unless i told it to write it.
that command makes one for you
ok. yea ill try that one in a bit when i can. thanks.
